# exposeBinding(_:)

**Type Method**

Exposes the specified `binding`, advertising its availability.

## Declaration

```swift
class func exposeBinding(_ binding: NSBindingName)
```

## Parameters

- **binding**: The key path for the property to be exposed.

## Discussion

The bound property will be accessed using key-value-coding compliant methods. This method is typically invoked in the class’s `initialize` implementation.

Bindings exposed using `exposeBinding` will be exposed automatically in [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObject-swift.class/exposedBindings] unless that method explicitly filters them out, for example in subclasses.

## Exposing bindings

- **exposedBindings**: Returns an array containing the bindings exposed by the receiver.

items.description: Returns an array containing the bindings exposed by the receiver.
